posts.postText: Well hearing that there's no discussion currently taking place in the Staff Corner, I'm just wondering what exactly is being done with current applications? I understand that I don't even have a word for current applicants, as that is not what I'm looking for, just would like to know if they're going to be dealt with.
I've been wondering this as well.. Same goes for the Jail applicants
Jailbreak apps I think I've made my decision, going to confirm with Ben, talk to the applicants I want on, and then accept them. Jail apps should be closed within the week.

Well you're part of the staff PH, so you do have a say. That's why you're given access to the staff corner. Anyways, I always thought it was just Gash and Ben that could decide for TTT with Quack in Jail. Some of the applicants are starting to get impatient o.o

>> Well you're part of the staff PH, so you do have a say. That's why you're given access to the staff corner. Anyways, I always thought it was just Gash and Ben that could decide for TTT with Quack in Jail. Some of the applicants are starting to get impatient o.o 
I don't actually have the right to accept TTT applications, but I do go over them with Gash.

>> Well you're part of the staff PH, so you do have a say. That's why you're given access to the staff corner. Anyways, I always thought it was just Gash and Ben that could decide for TTT with Quack in Jail. Some of the applicants are starting to get impatient o.o 
Well what I meant was that I didn't want it to seem like I was implying I wanted to be able to give my opinion on the applicants.

But it looks like so Gash has actually dealt with the applicants, so thanks.
Also, seeing how all applicants have now been dealth with, and apps have been open for almost four months, do you think we could close them now?
